drupalNodeEvent.title: Panel Discussion – The Future of Africa-China Engagement/Relations

field_speakers.processed: Maria Adele Carrai (Assistant Professor of Global China Studies NYU Shanghai; Harvard University Asia Center Associate), Folashadé Soulé (University of Oxford Blavatnik School of Government), Lina Benabdallah (Wake Forest University Politics and International Affairs Department), Emmanuel K. Akyeampong (Harvard University Center for African Studies)

field_organizers.processed: Harvard University Fairbank Center For Chinese Studies

field_description.processed: Sponsored by the Harvard University Asia Center; Co-sponsored by the Harvard University Center for African Studies and Fairbank Center for Chinese Studies, Harvard University.
